title: Christian Eriksen scores third-fastest goal in Premier League history
description: Watch as Christian Eriksen scored the opener in Tottenham's 2-0 win over Manchester United inside 11 seconds - making it the third-fastest Premier League goal ever.
content: Eriksen took his place in the fastest goal charts behind Ledley King and Alan Shearer after latching onto the loose ball as United's defence stood and watched to set Spurs on their way to a crucial three points at Wembley.The Denmark international was excellent all match, with the victory being made more comfortable by Phil Jones' own goal in the 28th minute.With Manchester City winning again, United now trail their bitter rivals by 15 points, while Spurs closed the gap on the top four to two points ahead of a trip to third-placed Liverpool at the weekend.Hit the video above to see Eriksen catch United napping
